title: TTS | Login Page Load with Email Address field highlighted
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an unauthenticated user selects the Login button
AND the user has TTS Enabled
custom_steps: WHEN the Login Page loads
custom_expected:
THEN the Email Address field should be highlighted 
AND the app should communicate: “There are three ways to login on this page. You are currently highlighting the email field. You may also use your phone to login via QR code; users also have the option to visit mlb.com/activate and enter the 8 digit code on your screen. Your code is {code}."

**NOTE** : The express Login only applies if the app being tested has that feature.

title: TTS | Up button from the Email Address field
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an unauthenticated user is on the Login Page
AND the user has TTS Enabled
AND the Email Address field is highlighted
custom_steps: WHEN the user hits the up button
custom_expected: THEN the app should read "There is no selectable content above the current position. There are three ways to login on this page. You are currently highlighting the email field. You may also use your phone to login via QR code; users also have the option to visit mlb.com/activate and enter the 8 digit code on your screen. Your code is {code}."

title: TTS | Email Entry
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an unauthenticated user is on the Login Page
AND the user has TTS Enabled
custom_steps:
WHEN the user moves focus to the Email entry
OR the user selects to enter an Email
OR the user complete their Email entry
custom_expected: THEN the app reader says "The email field is selected. Please hit select to enter the email address associated with your MLB.TV account. Press or scroll down to enter your password."

title: TTS | Password Entry
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an unauthenticated user is on the Login Page
AND the user has TTS Enabled
custom_steps:
WHEN the user moves focus to the Password entry
OR the user selects to enter a Password
OR the user complete their password entry
custom_expected: THEN the app reader says "The password field is selected. Please hit select to enter the password associated with your MLB.TV account. Press or scroll up to enter your email. Press or scroll right to uncover your password. Press or scroll down to hit the login button”

title: TTS | Focus on Uncover Password button
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an unauthenticated user is on the Login Page
AND the user has TTS Enabled
custom_steps: WHEN the user shifts focus to the Uncover Password button
custom_expected: THEN the app reads "The password is currently hidden. Hit select to unhide your password. Scroll or hit left to edit your password. Scroll down to cancel your login.”

title: TTS | Select Uncover Password button
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an unauthenticated user is on the Login Page
AND the user has TTS Enabled
AND the password is currently Hidden
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the Unhide Password button
custom_expected: THEN the app reader says "The password is currently unhidden. Hit select to hide your password. Scroll or hit left to edit your password. Scroll down to cancel your login.”

title: TTS | Focus on Login button
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an unauthenticated user is on the Login Page
AND the user has TTS Enabled
custom_steps: WHEN the user focuses on the Login button
custom_expected: THEN the app reads "Press select to Login. Press right to cancel login. Press up to update password.”

title: TTS | Focus on Cancel button
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an unauthenticated user is on the Login Page
AND the user has TTS Enabled
custom_steps: WHEN the user focuses on the Cancel button
custom_expected: THEN the app reads "Press select to cancel login and return to your previous screen. Press left to log in. Press up to update password.”

title: TTS | Scrolling below Login or Cancel button
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an unauthenticated user is on the Login Page
AND the user has TTS Enabled
custom_steps: WHEN the user attempts to scroll below the Login or Cancel button
custom_expected:
THEN the app reads "There is no selectable content below. The footer reads {footer}.

title: TTS | Server Error on Login attempt
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an unauthenticated user has entered their credentials on the Login Page
AND the user has TTS Enabled
custom_steps: WHEN the user attempts to Login and the server returns an error
custom_expected:
THEN the app reads "We encountered an issue while trying to log you in. <Read error> "

Example: “We encountered an issue while trying to log you in. **The email address or password was incorrect. Please verify your login credentials and try again.**”

title: TTS | Express Login is Present
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app includes Express login
AND the user has TTS enabled
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to the right from the Unhide Password button
custom_expected: THEN the app reader says "There is no selectable content to the right of this button. However, using your phone you can use your camera to engage with a QR code that will allow you to login on your phone.”

title: TTS | No Selectable Content
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user launches the app
AND the user has TTS enabled
custom_steps: WHEN a user navigates in a direction that has no selectable content
custom_expected:
THEN the app reads "There is no selectable content available to the <direction> of the current position”

**Examples:**
Up press on the directional pad or joystick, “There is no selectable content available above the current position”

Left press on the directional pad or joystick when focused on the “Home” button, “There is no selectable content available to the left of the current position”

Right press on the directional pad or joystick when focused on the “Settings” button, “There is no selectable content available to the right of the current position”

title: Welcome page Create Free Account button
Welcome page Explore Free Content button
Create free MLB account page load
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is not logged in
AND TTS is turned ON
AND the user is on the Welcome page
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the "Create Free Account" button
custom_expected:
THEN the Create Free Account page loads
AND the following statement is spoken, "You are on the Create free MLB account page. Create your account today to watch the MLB.TV Free Game of the Day and much, much more. Press or scroll down to enter your email address. To exit creating an account, Press back to navigate back to welcome page. The email field is selected. Please hit select to enter your email address that you would like associated with your MLB.TV account. Press or scroll down to navigate to the password creation field."

title: Email field
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is not logged in
AND TTS is turned ON
AND the user is on the Create Free Account page
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to the "Email Address" field
custom_expected: THEN the following statement is spoken, "The email field is selected. Please hit select to enter your email address that you would like associated with your MLB.TV account. Press or scroll down to navigate to the password creation field."

title: Email field - Navigate up
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is not logged in
AND TTS is turned ON
AND the user is on the Create Free Account page
AND focus is already on the "Email Address" field
custom_steps: WHEN the user attempts to navigate up from the "Email Address" field
custom_expected: THEN the following statement is spoken, "There is no selectable content above the current position."

title: Password field
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is not logged in
AND TTS is turned ON
AND the user is on the Create Free Account page
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to the "Password" field
custom_expected: THEN the following statement is spoken, "The password field is selected Please hit select to enter your password that you would like associated with your MLB.TV account. Press or scroll to the right to expose or hide password. Press or scroll up to navigate to the email field, press or scroll down to navigate to your marketing preference selection."
